code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Pagination=props=>{const pageNumbers=[];if(props.currentPage===1){pageNumbers.push(props.currentPage);if(props.totalPage>=props.currentPage+1){pageNumbers.push(props.currentPage+1);}if(props.totalPage>=props.currentPage+2){pageNumbers.push(props.currentPage+2);}}else if(props.currentPage>1){if(props.currentPage>=3){pageNumbers.push(props.currentPage-2);pageNumbers.push(props.currentPage-1);}else{pageNumbers.push(props.currentPage-1);}pageNumbers.push(props.currentPage);if(props.totalPage>=props.currentPage){pageNumbers.push(props.currentPage+1);}if(props.totalPage>=props.currentPage+2){pageNumbers.push(props.currentPage+2);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{"aria-label":"...",className:"mt-5 bg-light d-flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"page-item",onClick:()=>props.paginate(1),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-link",children:"First Page"})}),pageNumbers.map(number=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>props.paginate(number),className:"page-item "+(props.currentPage===number?'active':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-link",children:number})},number)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"page-item",onClick:()=>props.paginate(props.totalPage),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-link",children:"Last Page"})})]})});};
